mapper.select: SELECT QSM.PLNT_CD, QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX, QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC) AS SMP_DPS_PROC_NM, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.PITM_TYP) AS PITM_TYP_NM, QSM.PITM_CD, QSM.PITM_NM, QSM.ANS_IDX, QSM.SMP_DIV_CD, QSM.MNG_SMP_VOL, QSM.SMP_STRG_MTD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QSM.SMP_STRG_MTD) AS SMP_STRG_MTD_NM, QSM.LOT_NO, QSM.BATCH_NO, QSM.INP_UNIT, QSM.MAK_DT, QSM.STRG_LMT, QSM.USE_LMT, QSM.IRG_YN, QSM.SMP_RMK, QSM.DPS_EXP_DT, QSM.SMP_DPS_APR_IDX, QSM.DPS_REA, QSM.DPS_CANL_REA, QSM.SMP_ETR_DT FROM QS_SMP_MNG QSM JOIN SY_APR_INFO SAI on QSM.PLNT_CD = SAI.PLNT_CD AND QSM.SMP_DPS_APR_IDX = SAI.APR_IDX WHERE QSM.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QSM.SMP_DPS_PROC IN ('S0270400', 'S0270600') AND QSM.ANS_TYP = 'S0230004' AND SAI.APR_YN = 'N' AND SMP_DIV_CD = 'S0260001' AND SAI.APR_UID = #{aprUid} ORDER BY QSM.SMP_MNG_IDX DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE QS_SMP_MNG SET SMP_DPS_PROC = #{smpDpsProc}, RJT_UID = #{rjtUid}, RJT_REA = #{rjtRea}, RJT_DS = SYSDATE WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND SMP_MNG_IDX = #{smpMngIdx}
